active_projects.description: Update specs/README.md to provide a brief overview of the directory contents, noting that numbered project directories accumulate and are archived to specs/archive/ by the /todo command

artifacts.summary: Research report identifying gaps in specs/README.md including missing archive documentation, outdated project numbering conventions, and absence of state file documentation
2-phase implementation plan to update specs/README.md with corrected project numbering and archive documentation
Implementation summary documenting all changes made to specs/README.md

active_projects.completion_summary: Updated specs/README.md to document the directory lifecycle, state management files (TODO.md, state.json, archive/state.json), correct project numbering convention, and archival workflow via /todo command.

active_projects.description: Adapt the current .claude/ agent system (designed for Lean codebase) to produce a stock .claude/ agent system for Neovim configuration maintenance that can be systematically extended for specific applications

artifacts.summary: Comprehensive research report with component categorization, architecture analysis, proposed Neovim system design, and 7-task implementation plan (14-21 hours estimated)
7-phase plan covering core extraction, Neovim context creation, agents, skills, rules, routing integration, and documentation
